title: in lieu of constructing housing for slum-dwellers according to regulations prepared under the Mahara
clause_text: in lieu of constructing housing for slum-dwellers according to regulations prepared under the Maharashtra Regional & Town Planning Act, 1966; for handing over land to the Authority for development of housing under PMAY by the Authority. The purposes as may be notified by the Government from time to time.
section: Cases eligible for Transferable Development Rights (TDR)
